awd_titl_txt: U.S.-Australia Joint Seminar: Control Mechanics Applied to  Robotics Systems / Los Angeles, CA / January 1989
awd_abstract_narration: This award will support a seminar, "Control Mechanics Applied to                Robotic Systems", organized jointly by Professor J.M. Skowronski of             the University of Southern California and Dr. G.F. Shannon of the               University of Queensland, Australia.  Participants will meet in Los             Angeles, California in January 1989 to discuss current research and             potential collaboration in the area of control mechanics.  Topics to            be covered include 1) control of uncertain systems, 2) control of               flexible-link structures, 3) decision making and coordination control           for mechanical systems, and 4) applications.                                                                                                                    The workshop is timely in that it will bring together leading                   American and Australian scientists and engineers in robotics under              uncertain environments, with applications to agriculture, mining, and           other areas.  The workshop should stimulate cooperative research                between the U.S. and Australia in robotics.
org_div_long_name: Office of International Science and Engineering
